list.abs: 对于这些害虫一般采用胃毒剂(stomach poison) 或触杀剂(contact poison)进行防治。对于蛀茎、潜叶或蛀果等钻蛀性害虫,因只是短时间暴露在外,故施药时间应掌握在.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: probably a shortening of Old French estomachier, from estomac (see stomach)

means.word_mean: 1. garment consisting of a V-shaped panel of stiff material worn over the chest and stomach in the 16th century
